DOC.brief_summary: This study intend evaluate treatment effectiveness BFC compare FSC COPD patient new ICS/LABA combination therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effectiveness Symbicort vs. Advair Among COPD Patients
DOC.criteria: Continuous health plan enrollment 12 month index Rx , least one prescription BFC FSC intake period , naive ICS/LABA therapy year prior first prescription claim , COPD diagnosis , age 40 time first prescription . ICS/LABA combination preindex period , patient claim BFC FSC day , patient diagnose cancer , patient longterm OCS medication use preindex period .
